altText: EndlessRunner game thumbnail showcasing fast-paced gameplay
title: EndlessRunner - UE5 Game
description: A fast-paced Endless Runner game made with Unreal Engine 5.4 using Blueprints, featuring power-ups, increasing difficulty, and multi-platform support for Windows and Android.

title: Spoty – Discord Music Companion
description: A feature-rich Discord music bot and companion site built with Python and Discord.py, offering high-quality audio streaming, queue management, subscription plans, and a dynamic web interface powered by HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL.

altText: YouTube Video Downloader Python app interface
title: YouTube Video Downloader 2.0 - Python Tool
description: A Python-based YouTube downloader supporting high-quality video/audio downloads via yt_dlp and FFmpeg. Offers folder selection, audio-only/video-only modes, and executable packaging with CXFreeze.

title: BotsApp - PHP Web Chat Application
description: A fully working PHP-based chat app enabling individual and group messaging via polling and notifications. Features file/image sharing with real time progress bar for upload and download, custom emoji uploads just like Discord (private, public, group), online-offline status check just like Whatsapp, and a MySQL backend for secure, reliable communication.

altText: Code snippet demonstrating postReq JS utility with progress tracking
title: postReq — Custom JS Utility
description: A lightweight JavaScript function that mimics Fetch API behavior for PHP backends, providing standardized HTTP requests with built-in upload/download progress tracking, cancellation hooks, and configurable options.

altText: Veda Aesthetica Clinic website screenshot showing responsive layout
title: Veda Aesthetica — Official Website
description: A fast, SEO-optimized, and responsive website for Veda Aesthetica Clinic built using Astro, Tailwind CSS, and modern web development practices, featuring structured data, dynamic JSON-based content, and integration-ready components.
